sentences.en: Bartlett Booby ! Heads up over there. Watch your flying.
sentences.cn: AskBooby! 提高警惕了. 小心飞行.

sentences.en: Booby traps are triggered by enemy units attempting to capture the point.
sentences.cn: 伪雷将在敌人试图占领该点时被触发.

sentences.en: ChopperAsk Is the attack target confirmed , Booby?
sentences.cn: 找到攻击目标了吗,伙计?

sentences.en: Everybody thinks: He sells chicken when crow, it is a booby certainly.
sentences.cn: 大家想: 他把鸡当鸦卖, 一定是个呆子.

sentences.en: Finally he asked Booby's mother a few questions.
sentences.cn: 最后,他向波比的妈妈问了一些问题.

sentences.en: My parents lost at vatican roulette and I am the booby prize.
sentences.cn: 我父母安全期避孕失败了,我就是这次失败的纪念品.

sentences.en: Police were checking the area for booby traps.
sentences.cn: 警察在这个地区探测饵雷。

sentences.en: Saboteur: Booby Trap Mine splash radius increased sensitively.
sentences.cn: 破坏者: 诡雷杀伤范围明显增大.

sentences.en: The boy won a booby prize for telling the worst story.
sentences.cn: 那男孩故事讲得很差,得了个未等奖.

sentences.en: They dug trenches in their path and set booby traps.
sentences.cn: 他们在小路上挖深沟设饵雷。

sentences.en: They walked right into a booby-trap and got blown to smithereens.
sentences.cn: 他们正好踩上了饵雷，结果被炸得粉身碎骨。

sentences.en: We had to explore the terrain carefully lest booby traps go off all around us.
sentences.cn: 我们必须仔细地探明地形,以免触发布满我们四周的饵雷.

sentences.en: You cannot improve a dull booby into a man of sense.
sentences.cn: 你不能把傻头傻脑的笨蛋改造成通情达理的人.

words.tran_cn: 呆子；傻瓜；塘鹅；（在比赛或游戏中）成绩最差的人

phrases.tran_cn: 恶作剧；[军]诡雷；诱杀装置
